name: Ying Lianjie
story: Chang Guo joined the OPFOR army at a young age and quickly showed potential as a medic. He was trained as a Combat Life Saver and has since been deployed on multiple missions. Despite the dangers of his role, Chang remains calm and focused, knowing that the lives of his fellow soldiers are in his hands. He is a dedicated Buddhist and spends his free time meditating and practicing Tai Chi.
